meanings.sent1: The dunny in the park was clean and well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the dunny before we leave for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon thought the dunny was a cozy spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: After the storm, the backyard looked like a dunny with all the fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The dunny at the campsite had a beautiful view of the lake.

meanings.sent1: I will dunny quickly before we head out.
meanings.sent2: She dunnied before the long movie started.
meanings.sent3: The cat always seems to want attention when I need to dunny.
meanings.sent4: His excuses for not dunnying were as creative as his artwork.
meanings.sent5: Please remind the kids to dunny before we leave the house.
